set(CMSIS_CORE_DIR          ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmsis_core                  PARENT_SCOPE)
set(CMSIS_DEVICE_F0_DIR     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmsis_device_f0             PARENT_SCOPE)
set(STM32F0XX_HAL_DIR       ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stm32f0xx_hal_driver        PARENT_SCOPE)
set(FREERTOS_DIR            ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/FreeRTOS-Kernel             PARENT_SCOPE)
set(CIRCULAR_BUFFER_DIR     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/circular_buffer   PARENT_SCOPE)
